TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TreeWalker extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于导航 UI 自动化树的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to navigate the UI Automation tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端将[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]桌面上的元素查看为以树结构排列的一组对象。UI Automation clients view the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements on the desktop as a set of objects arranged in a tree structure. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 通过使用类,客户端应用程序可以在树中导航,方法是选择树的视图,并使用、、、、和方法。Using the class, a client application can navigate the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree by selecting a view of the tree and stepping from one to another in a specified direction using the , , , , and methods. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]使用在树中导航可能会导致跨进程调用, 并且与使用或方法查找元素相比效率更高。 Navigating the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree using can result in cross-process calls and is not as efficient as locating an element using the or methods. 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素, 则[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]必须在单独的线程上进行所有调用。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Automation.Condition condition) cil managed

param.name: condition
param.span: 将要导航的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素目录树的视图。

span.span: The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree that will navigate.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]当用于导航元素树`condition`时 , 将跳过与不匹配的元素。elements that do not match `condition` are skipped over when is used to navigate the element tree. 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素, 则[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]必须在单独的线程上进行所有调用。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何构造仅在已启用元素中导航的。The following example shows how you can construct a that navigates only among enabled elements. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#174](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#174)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#174](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#174)]

summary.span: 检索指定 的第一个子元素。

span.span: Retrieves the first child element of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以具有与当前视图条件不匹配的其他子元素, 因此在导航元素树时不会返回。An can have additional child elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 树的结构随桌面上可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素的变化而变化。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保证以第一个子元素形式返回的元素将作为后续传递中的第一个子元素返回。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the first child element will be returned as the first child on subsequent passes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement GetParent(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement element) cil managed

span.span: The element whose parent is to be returned.

summary.span: 检索指定 的父元素。

span.span: Retrieves the parent element of the specified .

returns.span: 父元素；如果指定元素为目录树中的根元素或者父元素在当前视图中不可见，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: The parent element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the specified element is the root element in the tree, or if the parent element is not visible in the current view.

Public Function GetParent (element As AutomationElement, request As CacheRequest) As AutomationElement

span.span: The element whose parent is to be returned.

param.name: request
param.span: 一个缓存请求对象，它指定返回的 上要进行缓存的成员。

span.span: A cache request object specifying members on the returned to cache.

summary.span: 检索指定的 的父元素并缓存属性和模式。

span.span: Retrieves the parent element of the specified and caches properties and patterns.

returns.span: 父元素；如果指定元素为目录树中的根元素或者父元素在此视图中不可见，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: The parent element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the specified element is the root element in the tree, or the parent element is not visible in this view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 树的结构随桌面上可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素的变化而变化。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保证作为父元素返回的元素将作为父元素返回到后续阶段。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the parent element will be returned as the parent on subsequent passes.

summary.span: 检索指定 的上一同级元素。

span.span: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以具有与当前视图条件不匹配的其他同级元素, 因此在导航元素树时不会返回。An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 树的结构随桌面上可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素的变化而变化。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保证作为上一个同级元素返回的元素将作为前面的同级元素返回。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

param.name: element
param.span: 从中检索上一个同级的元素。

span.span: The element from which to retrieve the previous sibling.

span.span: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified .

span.span: The previous sibling element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no such element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以具有与当前视图条件不匹配的其他同级元素, 因此在导航元素树时不会返回。An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 树的结构随桌面上可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素的变化而变化。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保证作为上一个同级元素返回的元素将作为前面的同级元素返回。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

Public Function GetPreviousSibling (element As AutomationElement, request As CacheRequest) As AutomationElement

param.name: element
param.span: 从中检索上一个同级的元素。

span.span: The element from which to retrieve the previous sibling.

param.name: request
param.span: 一个缓存请求对象，它指定返回的 上要进行缓存的属性和模式。

span.span: A cache request object specifying properties and patterns on the returned to cache.

summary.span: 检索指定的 的上一个同级并缓存属性和模式。

span.span: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified and caches properties and patterns.

returns.span: 上一个同级元素；如果不存在此类元素，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: The previous sibling element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no such element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以具有与当前视图条件不匹配的其他同级元素, 因此在导航元素树时不会返回。An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 树的结构随桌面上可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素的变化而变化。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保证作为上一个同级元素返回的元素将作为前面的同级元素返回。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

span.span: Obtaining UI Automation Elements

summary.span: 在 的此实例所使用的树视图中检索与指定的 最接近的上级元素。

span.span: Retrieves the ancestor element nearest to the specified in the tree view used by this instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过在树中导航上级链来规范化元素, 直到达到满足对象的视图条件的元素。The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the object is reached. 如果已到达根元素, 则返回根元素, 即使该元素不满足视图条件。If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition. 此方法对于通过命中测试获取对[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素的引用的应用程序很有用。This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing. 该应用程序可能只希望使用特定类型的元素, 并且可以使用来确保无论最初检索的是什么元素 (例如, 当滚动条获得输入焦点时), 只需要相关的元素 (如内容元素)。The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement Normalize(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement element) cil managed
Public Function Normalize (element As AutomationElement) As AutomationElement

param.name: element
param.span: 从其开始规范化的元素。

span.span: The element from which to start the normalization.

summary.span: 检索节点本身（如果它满足 ）或者检索满足 的最接近的父级或上级节点。

span.span: Retrieves the node itself, if it satisfies the , or the nearest parent or ancestor node that satisfies the .
The nearest in the current view.

returns.span: 如果沿上级链向上导航到达根元素，将返回根元素。

span.span: If the navigation up the ancestor chain reaches the root element, the root element is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过在树中导航上级链来规范化元素, 直到达到满足对象的视图条件的元素。The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the object is reached. 如果已到达根元素, 则返回根元素, 即使该元素不满足视图条件。If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition. 此方法对于通过命中测试获取对[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素的引用的应用程序很有用。This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing. 该应用程序可能只希望使用特定类型的元素, 并且可以使用来确保无论最初检索的是什么元素 (例如, 当滚动条获得输入焦点时), 只需要相关的元素 (如内容元素)。The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过在树中导航上级链来规范化元素, 直到达到满足对象的视图条件的元素。The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the object is reached. 如果已到达根元素, 则返回根元素, 即使该元素不满足视图条件。If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition. 此方法对于通过命中测试获取对[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素的引用的应用程序很有用。This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing. 该应用程序可能只希望使用特定类型的元素, 并且可以使用来确保无论最初检索的是什么元素 (例如, 当滚动条获得输入焦点时), 只需要相关的元素 (如内容元素)。The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker RawViewWalker
Public Shared ReadOnly RawViewWalker As TreeWalker

summary.span: 表示一个预定义的 ，其中包含目录树中所有元素的视图。

span.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of all the elements in the tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素, 则[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]必须在单独的线程上进行所有调用。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造树中元素的树视图。The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. 的用法是相同的。The usage for is identical. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#171)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#171)]
